item.description:
SHOP THE SEASONâ€™S HOTTEST TRENDS IN FASHION, BEAUTY, AND STYLE.

Evening Highlights:
*Complimentary Champagne Cocktails by Barefoot Wine.
*Score our famous Swag Bag tote filled with Goodies.
*Explore the StyleFixx Wine Pavillion.
*Indulge in free Spa and Beauty treatments.
*More than 55 vendors

Tickets - 2 for $15 with LivingSocial deal otherwise 1 for $30.
Livingsocial deal:
https://www.livingsocial.com/deals/667004?ref=personalized-link-box-114910592_share&rpi=114910592

Website: http://www.stylefixx.com/

This event looks super fun, there are two dates 5-10 PM on May 1 (Wed) and May 2 (Thurs). I suggest Thursday, so that we can make the most of it, but feel free to go to either!

Optional meet and greet at the bar area every hour (Thursday):

5:30
